Articles.Content:
Hello there

I don't know if I placed this Thread in the right section, so I'm sorry if it's totally wrong here.

Anyway, I want to present you the USG Ishimura in Kerbal Space Program.

I saw the Ishimura from SuestraGaming on Youtube and it was totally amazing.

So I took the challange to "overhaul" it and when it's done to weld it.

More screenshots coming soon.

Wow - amazing! This is going to be great.

So all those panels can be welded successfully?

I have had a hard time with welder. Large wleded parts crashing the game.

Edited February 1, 2014 by Top8
the welding is no problem. all parts are in their original form. but welding one of the towers takes about 10 minutes.

So after many game crashes it's finnaly done! All parts got welded into one part (1330 to 1).

I didn't added some engines for now, just wanted to test it in orbit (used hyperEdit).

The whole ship handeled pretty well. The game is not lagging and the Ishimura can be turned or

flipped fast.
